content.text: 1 bunch fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-6 "1 bunch fresh asparagus, trimmed and cut into 1 inch pieces" )
( ing-7 "1/3 cup uncooked long-grain white rice" )

content.text: 0) Melt the butter in a large pot over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Melt"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the butter"@8:18 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@22:33 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@39:50 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Stir in the leeks and onion, and cook until tender.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the leeks"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "onion"@25:30 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cook"@36:40 / AC
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until tender"@41:53 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Mix in potatoes, carrots, asparagus, and rice.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Mix in"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "potatoes"@10:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "carrots"@20:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "asparagus"@29:38 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "rice"@44:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer 30 minutes, until vegetables and rice are tender.
6) Stir spinach and heavy cream into the soup mixture, and continue cooking about 5 minutes before serving.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "Stir"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "spinach"@8:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "heavy cream"@20:31 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "the soup mixture"@37:53 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-1 "continue cooking"@59:75 / AC
		:duration ( dur-6-0 "5 minutes"@82:91 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-6-2 "serving"@99:106 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
